divs: Sighting Detailsout the window observed light green glowing orb with slash shape shadow within orb. decending direction from south to north . through trees at night. lasted about a second . at first maybe a roman candle . but too large and flight was slightly decending. wacthing tv with window beside tv.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Commerce Township
